name: SSHelper (ssh helper/ssh помощник)
description: SSHelper            .      SSH .                 .    ,     -             SSH.        . SSHelper allows you to quickly create control buttons for daily operation and monitoring devices. Transfer of control commands is done via SSH. Accordingly, you can assign any button on your set of commands and quickly transfer these commands to the device, if necessary.  The main objective pursued in the design - is the automation and simplification of daily operations at the user level using the SSH protocol.  In the future we plan to add other protocols.
